CustomField.description: 8/19: M.Kim - renamed Label from Allocated Expenses to Travel Expense: Estimate ADO 39187 - Changed label from Expense Amount to Allocated Expenses.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Covers Consultant travel for on-site Delivery. Assumes $2,500/round-trip, applies to PM resource when Fixed Services includes PM Hrs. Unused/remaining amount contributes to Revenue when Customer opts for remote delivery.
CustomField.label: Travel Expense: Estimate
